name: abc: recraftables [DEPRECATED]
title: abc: recraftables [DEPRECATED]
description: # This mod has been deprecated, please use [abc: crafting](https://modrinth.com/datapack/abc-crafting) - Adds the ability to craft uncraftable items in Minecraft - Removes some difficulty to the game ### Current items - Bell - Budding Amethyst - Cobweb - Calcite - Enchanted Golden Apple - Heart of the sea - Name Tag - Saddle - String - Spore blossom - Soul soil - Trident - Tuff - Bedrock - All Saplings - Ender Pearls - Command Block - Nether Star - Barrier - Elytra - Dead Bush - Totem of Undying ### Planned - All Ores - Horse Armour - Spawn Eggs - - Mushroom Block - Brown - Red ### Donate If you want to support me and my projects you can support me [here](https://github.com/sponsors/devvyyxyz/)
short_description: Makes some items and blocks easily easily gainable by adding new recipes and loot drops.
author: abcxyz

name: abc: low fire
title: abc: low fire
description:
![abc: lowfire](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/84b03d197253903bcddbb221de58ebf957d08bb6.png)
Makes the fire texture on screen lower for easier viewing

## Step-by-Step Guide

1. **Open the Project Page**  
   Visit the Modrinth, CurseForge, GitHub, or project website for the content you want to download.

2. **Find the Versions or Files Section**  
   Look for a tab or section labelled **Versions**, **Files**, **Releases**, or **Downloads**.

3. **Select Your Minecraft Version**  
   - Locate a list or dropdown called **Version**, **Game Version**, or **Supported Versions**.  
   - Pick the version that matches your Minecraft installation (e.g., *1.20.1*, *1.19.2*).

4. **Choose the Correct File Type**  
   The file type depends on the kind of content:  
   - **Mods:** `.jar`  
   - **Plugins:** `.jar`  
   - **Addons (Bedrock):** `.mcaddon` / `.mcpack`  
   - **Texture Packs:** `.zip`  
   - **Data Packs:** `.zip` or extracted folder  
   - **Capes / Skin Addons:** whichever format the creator provides  

5. **Download the File**  
   Click the **Download**, **Get**, or **File** button next to the version you need.  
   Save the file to your device.

6. **Install According to Content Type**  
   - **Mods:** place the `.jar` inside `.minecraft/mods`.  
   - **Plugins:** move the `.jar` into your server’s `plugins` folder.  
   - **Texture Packs:** place the `.zip` into `.minecraft/resourcepacks`.  
   - **Data Packs:** put inside `world/datapacks`.  
   - **Addons (Bedrock):** double-click `.mcaddon` or `.mcpack` to import automatically.  

7. **Restart Minecraft or Your Server**  
   Reload or restart to apply the new content.
short_description: Makes the fire texture on screen lower for easier viewing
author: abcxyz

description:
![Gold title](https://github.com/devvyyxyz/modrinth-text-packs/blob/main/resources/gold%20title.png?raw=true)

- Makes the Minecraft title gold
- Makes the Minecraft Realms title gold(not yet implemented)

## Step-by-Step Guide

1. **Open the Project Page**

2. **Find the Versions or Files Section**

   - **Addons (Bedrock):** `.mcaddon` / `.mcpack`  
   - **Texture Packs:** `.zip`  
   - **Data Packs:** `.zip` or extracted folder  
   - **Capes / Skin Addons:** whichever format the creator provides  

5. **Download the File**  
   Click the **Download**, **Get**, or **File** button next to the version you need.

6. **Install According to Content Type**

   - **Texture Packs:** place the `.zip` into `.minecraft/resourcepacks`.

![abc: chromakey](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/75416fd8862854aee9f7beda28dd6d6a33688250.png)
Adds a set of chroma-key blocks perfect for video recording, green-screen effects, and clean compositing in Minecraft.

| Item | Recipe | Status |

author: abcxyz

name: abc: useless achievements
title: abc: useless achievements
description:
![abc: useless achievements](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/d75c7b050ddf12e71722c38e7c09654e3c7c5e0a.png)
Adds useless achievements to the game by completing meaningless tasks


|Name|description|Requirments|Status|
|----|----|----|----|
|Dirt|dirting it up|
|Diamonds i think|These are diamonds i think...nevermind...|
|Weird dirt|This isnt dirt...|
|Stick collector|Obtain exactly one stick. Not two. One.|
|Bark enjoyer|Appreciate its texture|
|Grass whisperer|have a single grass block (the tall grass, not the dirt). Listen closely.|
|Moo|Enter the mushroom fields biome|
|It's bitter|Eat a mushroom of both types|
|Rock sniffer|Acquire a cobblestone and pretend it's fascinating|
|Leaf inspector|Study the complex life-cycle of a leaf. Very scientific|
|Jumping for no reason|N/A|N/A|N/A|

![In game achievements tab](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/cached_images/1c64ecd68bf14da2a717dac92a9cec67601ddc0a_0.webp)


## Step-by-Step Guide

1. **Open the Project Page**  
   Visit the Modrinth, CurseForge, GitHub, or project website for the content you want to download.

2. **Find the Versions or Files Section**  
   Look for a tab or section labelled **Versions**, **Files**, **Releases**, or **Downloads**.

3. **Select Your Minecraft Version**  
   - Locate a list or dropdown called **Version**, **Game Version**, or **Supported Versions**.  
   - Pick the version that matches your Minecraft installation (e.g., *1.20.1*, *1.19.2*).

4. **Choose the Correct File Type**  
   The file type depends on the kind of content:  
   - **Mods:** `.jar`  
   - **Plugins:** `.jar`  
   - **Addons (Bedrock):** `.mcaddon` / `.mcpack`  
   - **Texture Packs:** `.zip`  
   - **Data Packs:** `.zip` or extracted folder  
   - **Capes / Skin Addons:** whichever format the creator provides  

5. **Download the File**  
   Click the **Download**, **Get**, or **File** button next to the version you need.  
   Save the file to your device.

6. **Install According to Content Type**  
   - **Mods:** place the `.jar` inside `.minecraft/mods`.  
   - **Plugins:** move the `.jar` into your server’s `plugins` folder.  
   - **Texture Packs:** place the `.zip` into `.minecraft/resourcepacks`.  
   - **Data Packs:** put inside `world/datapacks`.  
   - **Addons (Bedrock):** double-click `.mcaddon` or `.mcpack` to import automatically.  

7. **Restart Minecraft or Your Server**  
   Reload or restart to apply the new content.
short_description: Adds useless achievements to the game by completing meaningless tasks
